Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_ASHE>
<MYNAME>, thank you so much for inviting us
over today.
<PAGE>
I'm looking forward to having a great time with
you all.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Now then, ladies and gentlemen, what say we
forget about sales and transactions for a few
hours and simply enjoy ourselves?

<NAME_MOB_ASHE>
<MYNAME>, your home is so lovely! I'm a little
jealous. I wish I had these mad skills in interior
decorating.
<PAGE>
In Silk Country, most homes are only one story.
There are some members of the royal family who
have sprawling palaces, though.

<NAME_MOB_ASHE>
How is your farm doing, <MYNAME>? Good, I
hope.
<PAGE>
Oh, that's great to hear. You've always been such
a great partner for us that when I hear you're
doing well, I know we'll be doing well, too!

<NAME_MOB_ASHE>
Thank you for the great drinks today.
<PAGE>
Silk Country has a wide selection of excellent
teas, you know. I hope you stop by to pick
some more up sometime.

<NAME_MOB_MARIEL>
Wow! This <ITEMNAME0> is really
good!
<PAGE>
Cabin Country has some great drinks, too. You
should try them sometime!

<NAME_MOB_MARIEL>
This house is really impressive. It even smells
nice inside!
<PAGE>
A great house, great company, and great
drinks... You've got all the right things for a
good time.

<NAME_MOB_MARIEL>
<MYNAME>, your farm is really cool. It reminds
me so much of home!
<PAGE>
There are lots of farms like this in Cabin Country,
but there's also lots of snow, which does make
it kind of hard to get around.

<NAME_MOB_YOSHINO>
So this is the spread you set up for us, big
boss? Consider me impressed! I'm really digging
these drinks.
<PAGE>
Thank you so much for having us out today!

<NAME_MOB_YOSHINO>
I am very glad for the chance to speak with all of
the merchants here. And with you too, of
course.
<PAGE>
When you're a trader, it's always good to know
as much as you can about other countries.

<NAME_MOB_YOSHINO>
Sakura Country has its own variety of tea
ceremony, but er... Those sorts of parties aren't
really my thing.
<PAGE>
I like these kinds much better. Way more
relaxed, and lots of interesting people to chat
with.

<NAME_MOB_KENNETH>
Hey, pardner! This is one great shindig you've
got going here! Back in Wheat Country, now, we
know a thing or two about throwin' parties.
<PAGE>
Lots of different kinds, with lots of different
people! There's dancing, eating, and maybe a
game of truth-or-dare!

<NAME_MOB_KENNETH>
Y'know, we've got a whole mess of farms back
in Wheat Country. Big ones, real spread out
under the open sky. Lots'a cows, too.
<PAGE>
But there ain't too much neighborliness, though.
The farms are so big you've gotta drive to see
your closest neighbor!

<NAME_MOB_KENNETH>
Well howdy! This is one doozy of a house.
You've got some mighty fine taste, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
The drinks are darn good, too. Bottoms up!

<NAME_MOB_ENNIO>
Heh. This is actually a rather fine room. Very
tasteful. I could relax in here.
<PAGE>
Tasteful decor, pleasant conversation with lovely
ladies, and a fine drink to sip. It's not often one
finds these luxuries all together!

<NAME_MOB_ENNIO>
Did you make this <ITEMNAME0>?
<PAGE>
Heh. You don't hold back the good stuff when
you're entertaining guests. I like that.

<NAME_MOB_ENNIO>
Heh. Merchants don't often spend time
socializing together, but I'm enjoying talking
with everyone here.
<PAGE>
I'm thankful you brought us all together like this,
<MYNAME>.

<NAME_MOB_IOANE>
Ooh, I love tea parties. There're lots of really
good drinks, and lots of people to talk with
about all kinds of things.
<PAGE>
The best part is seeing old friends and making
new friends. Parties are really important, y'know.

<NAME_MOB_IOANE>
Parties in Tropical Country are a lot louder than
here. There's dancing, singing, and lots and lots
of laughing.
<PAGE>
There's some kind of party going on almost
every night! And...I go to most of them. So I'm
always really sleepy in the morning...

<NAME_MOB_IOANE>
Living on a farm sounds like lots of fun. You get
to have cows and grow crops and do whatever
you want at your own pace.

<NAME_MOB_KATRINA>
Parties are a lot of fun.
<PAGE>
Ice Country is really cold. Too cold to talk. So I
stopped.

<NAME_MOB_KATRINA>
This drink is good. I wish I could take it home.
<PAGE>
You should ship some to us. People would like
it.

<NAME_MOB_KATRINA>
Your farm is nice. Lots of flowers.
<PAGE>
Ice Country's ground is covered with frost. Not
many flowers grow.

<NAME_MOB_ASHE>
<MYNAME>, thank you for a very enjoyable tea
party today.
<PAGE>
I hope we can all continue our lucrative
partnerships, and I look forward to doing
business with you in the future.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, I received a tip from
<GREEN><MOJI0></GREEN>'s <BLUE><CHARANAME0></BLUE>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>They mentioned they will be having a sale next
<BLUE><MOJI1></BLUE> as a thank you for today's party.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It seemed like everyone had a wonderful time
today. You put on an excellent party,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Please allow me to give you a small thank-you
gift for all the work you put in to make this
happen.
<PAGE>
I hope you like this <GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN>.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
If you wouldn't mind, it would be a real treat if
you could hold another Tea Party like this next
year. Again, thank you for a lovely afternoon.
